dict.acceptation: 特别喜欢的人（或物）；喜欢的事物；最有希望获胜者（尤指马）；收藏夹；

sent.orig: What's your favorite sport? My favorite sport is horse riding. See time!
sent.trans: 骑马也是个比赛的项目，到时候我一定会去看的。记住刚才那两句话了吗？

sent.orig: Brown is nominated for favorite male singer and favorite song.
sent.trans: Brown被提名为最受欢迎男歌手和最受欢迎歌曲。

sent.orig: Chocolate is my favorite flavor and vanilla is my second favorite.
sent.trans: 你喜欢的冰激凌是什么口味的？

sent.orig: My favorite actor is Jackie Chan and her favorite actress is Yang Ziqiong.
sent.trans: 我钟爱的男演员是成龙，她最喜欢的是女演员杨紫琼。

sent.orig: My favorite team is the Spainish Team. And my favorite football star is Yves Drogba Tébily.
sent.trans: 我最喜爱的球队是西班牙队，我最爱的球星是德罗巴。
